text: Tap Sus agɨl agnɨgelɨgɨpal anɨb ak, kal nop agnɨgep gɨlak ak, taun kab wali gol anɨb ak yek. Ak nɨm, bɨ Sus nop sɨbogep bɨawl ak, ne bɨ Sus pel agnopun ak mɨñɨl owup awl agɨl, chag bulmakaw aŋlam ogɨnap dɨl, mab sum teplep ogɨnap dɨl dad owak, kab wali kanɨbtub ak. Bɨawl anɨb ak ayɨp, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl ayɨp apɨl, chag bulmakaw ogɨnap Banabas ayɨp Pol ayɨp kɨlop pak sɨbog ñɨnɨg gɨlak.
